overview.summary: Allows handling of the connection strings. See

property.name: ConnectionString
property.summary: Gets or sets the connection string.

property.name: IsValid
property.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the connection string is valid or not.
property.value: true if the connection string is valid; or false if not.

property.name: UserID
property.summary: Gets or sets the firebird User account for login.

property.name: Password
property.summary: Gets ort sets the password for the Firebird user account.

property.name: DataSource
property.summary: Gets the name of the Firebird Server to which to connect.
property.value: The name of the Firebird Server to which to connect. The default value is an empty string.

property.name: Port
property.summary: Gets or sets the port number in the server for establish the connection

property.name: Database
property.summary: Gets the name of the actual database or the database to be used when a connection is open.
property.value: The name of the actual database or the database to be used when a connection is open. The default value is an empty string.

property.name: PacketSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of Firebird Server.
property.value: The size (in bytes) of network packets. The default value is 8192.

remarks.para: PacketSize may be in the rane 512-32767 bytes. An exception is generated if the value is outside of this range.

property.name: Role
property.summary: Gets or sets the suer role name.

property.name: Dialect
property.summary: Gets or sets the database dialect.
property.value: The database dialect. Default value is 3.

property.name: Charset
property.summary: Gets or sets the connection character set.

item.description: American Standard Code for Information Interchange.
MS-DOS United States, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa.

property.name: ConnectionTimeout
property.summary: Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
property.value: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open. The default value is 0 seconds.

property.name: Pooling
property.summary: Gets or sets the status of the connection pooling (enabled/disabled).
property.value: When true, the FbConnection object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool. Recognized values are true, false, yes, and no.

property.name: ConnectionLifeTime
property.summary: Gets or sets the lifetime of a connection in the pool.
property.value: When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by connection lifetime.

property.name: MinPoolSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the minumun pool size.
property.value: The minimun number of connections allowed in the pool. Default is 0.

property.name: MaxPoolSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximun pool size.
property.value: The maximun number of connections allowed in the pool. Default is 100.

property.name: FetchSize
property.summary: Indicates the number of rows that will be fetched at the same time on calls into the internal row buffer.
property.value: The maximun number of rows to be fetched in a single call to into the internal row buffer.

property.name: ServerType
property.summary: Gets or sets the server type to wich we want to connect.
property.remarks: When 0 the provider will use the GDS implementation used for connections to Firebird Super or Classic servers, when 1 the provider will use the GDS implementation used for connections to the Firebird embedded server.

property.name: IsolationLevel
property.summary: Gets or sets the default Isolation Leve for implicit transactions.

constructor.name: ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

constructor.name: ctor(System.String)
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified connection string.

method.summary: Parsed and loads a connection string object.
